title: Self-Regulated Learning and Educational Co-Design Competency Enhancement in Technology-Enhanced Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of scientific concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Blended classes using real-time collaboration tools and LMS (Learning Management System) in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways by applying self-regulated learning strategies (planning, cognitive regulation, motivation management)
Learners enhance collaborative problem-solving skills through an educational co-design process (needs analysis, content development, feedback incorporation)
Learners can solve practical tasks in the field of science by utilizing digital tools (real-time collaboration platforms, project management tools).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
